body.name: Soularge Women's Winter Plus Size Sherpa Lined Jacket with Detachable Hood
features: Fabric type Shell:100% cotton; Lining ;100% polyester sherpa lined

Stay Cozy - Keep yourself warm during winter. Our coats for women have a cotton outer shell and a thick sherpa lining that locks in heat. Breathable and skin-friendly materials ensure that you won't feel stuffy while wearing this outerwear. A detachable fur hood keeps your face and ears shielded from the wind.

Secure Your Essentials - Have your phone, wallet, keys, and cards with you wherever you go. This plus size coat comes with button snap pockets on the side and spacious inner pockets for your items. Lined with fleece, its large pockets also double as hand warmers, so you can tuck your hands in when your fingers start stinging against the burn of cold climes

Big Is Beautiful - Specifically designed to give plus size women better winterwear options, this hooded coat is available in sizes 1X to 5X. Our sizing is based on the body shape and size of a large number of people in the U.S. to ensure that we get a standard measurement. This jacket is perfect for thick and curvy ladies, as well as pregnant moms.

Durability You Can Rely On - The cotton fabric ships a bit flat, but will bounce back to its fluffy form after washing and drying. The brass zipper and buttons won't easily rip off, even as you hike or climb.
Always In Style - Look good no matter what you're doing in a stylish plus size winter coat. Wear it when traveling to the office, hiking, camping, or even when you're doing a quick grocery run.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: True pure cotton： Good warmth retention: The high-density weave of pure cotton fabric can effectively protect the body from cold air. Good breathability: Pure cotton fabric is breathable, providing a comfortable wearing experience and preventing discomfort caused by sweat buildup. High comfort: Pure cotton fabric is soft and comfortable, with a good hand feel and a comfortable wearing experience. Good abrasion resistance: Pure cotton fabric is abrasion-resistant and not prone to pilling, which contributes to its durability. Health and environmental : Pure cotton fabric is made of natural fibers, does not contain harmful chemicals, is safe for human health, and friendly to the environment. Easy to care: Pure cotton fabric is easy to clean, does not deform easily, and is comfortable to wear, making it easy to maintain on a daily basis.

Windproof faux fur Removable soft faux fur with button down snap ear to keep you warm in the winter 3D side pockets Fleece lined hand warmer slant pockets and secure button down snap pockets Double closure placket High quality SBS zipper with windproof button down placket

Soularge Women's Winter Plus Size Thickened Cotton Coat with Detachable Hood This plus size women's winter jacket from Soularge is designed to keep you stylish and cozy in the coldest weather. The soft and breathable material ensures maximum comfort while the chic design flatters your figure all season long. Available in a range of sizes, you can find your perfect fit and make a statement this winter. 1. Various size This winter jacket is specially designed for plus-size women, with a wide range of sizes from 1X to 6X. We understand that every woman deserves to feel comfortable in their own skin, and we're here to make sure that our clothing is there to support them, no matter their size. With our extensive size options, we're confident that we can help women of all shapes and sizes find the perfect fit. 2. Cold defender Stay warm and stylish this winter with our collection of coats. Our windproof hoods and ribbed cuffs keep out the chill, while our plush fleece-lined pockets will keep you cozy. Our coats are filled with premium insulation for maximum warmth and comfort. Find your perfect fit in our women's plus size coats and stay cozy this season. 3.Size chose: Check the size chart carefully, as sizing may vary across brands. Choose the size that best fits your measurements, taking into account height and weight. Read customer reviews to see how other customers found the sizing. This can be especially helpful if someone has a similar body type to you. 4.Wash care: Machine washable, hand washable, low-temperature drying, do not bleach, wash dark and light-colored garments separately. 5.Other: Cotton fabric jackets may develop wrinkles during the transportation process, but don't worry. They will bounce back to a fluffy and smooth state after washing and drying, or by hanging them in a well-ventilated area for a few days

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 16, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Very warm and seems durable. I ordered a size up and it was perfect leaving extra room for layering. The hood is a bit too large and comes down over my eyes but I fix that with wearing a hat or beanie and it stays out of my face. I dont like the puffy plastic jackets and this having 100% cotton shell is perfect and its soft but feels very durable. Ilike that it is long enough to cover the bum but honestly wish they made a longer one that goes to the calf then Id have the best of both worlds with both jackets. The jacket does have weight to it but that is expected when its not all puffy plastic. It keeps me warm and dry here in the PNW and thats the best part. I recommend this jacket

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 23, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I am sooo happy I found this coat. After shopping at all the stores around me I couldn’t find one that fit. I read reviews on all the coats on Amazon that I was interested in. Then BAM! I saw that there was a lady who had the same fitting problems I did and she loved her coat. I am short over weight and have short arms ( T Rex arms is what my girls call them) this coat fits perfect. I got a 3x and it was to big. I returned it and got a 2x (the original one was a pretty red but they didn’t have it in the 2x so I got brown and it is actually a nice brown) . It fit true to size. It’s not to long, the sleeves are still a bit long but , that’s my life. The pockets are in a comfortable place too. I’m only 4’10 so this is a big deal for me. It is SO warm. I live in the snow belt and it gets very cold. I’m a freeze baby too. 🥶This is going to be perfect, especially when taking the dog out and he takes forever. 🤣 it’s a warmer Christmas this year so I haven’t worn it yet. If you don’t mind the weight it is a heavy coat but super warm. I like the fact it has snaps as well as the zipper. I prefer a hood but for those who don’t you can remove it. I definitely recommend this coat. Especially for a shorter gal like me. However it would fit great on anyone. Stay warm!! I know I will and Merry Christmas 🎄

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 28, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Very warm and stylish! Use their size chart and it will fit.
reviews.reviewText: Very warm. The coat arrived squished into a plastic zipper bag and wrinkles from packaging/shipping were somewhat difficult to remove...it's not like you can easily iron it, but my steamer worked well. The coat is comfortable and kept me toasty warm in 20-degree weather. It's a bit bulky to carry on trips and it took up nearly half of my valuable suitcase space with the hood attached. The material will wrinkle, so perhaps not a great choice if you're choosing a coat for travel. I do love that both the hood and the fur trim on the hood are removable, as I don't always want the bulk of a hood, especially when in a car. My biggest complaint would be that the Sherpa on the inside sheds a bit onto your clothing, creating a light fuzz that stuck to my top underneath. I expect that issue will lessen with wear, but I would suggest using a Lint Roller on the lining before wearing it. Otherwise, this is a quality coat that is warm and attractive. I followed the size chart, and it suggested a size larger than I normally wear and it fit me perfectly by going up that one size, as suggested while wearing non-bulky tops. If you typically wear bulky sweaters/sweatshirts, or use multiple layers underneath, add another size, as it is a somewhat form-fitted design. I'm overall very happy with my purchase.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 15, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Warmest Coat Ever!
reviews.reviewText: This is the Best coat I have ever owned! By far the warmest! I love all the features, the ribbed cuff to keep air from going up sleeves, the double closures, heavy zipper and snaps. In the car its nice to just snap the top leaving the zipper undone. The hood if great, detachable, warm faux fur and i love that it snaps over your face if you want. This coat is well thought out and worth every penny!So happy with it!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Very warm, very comfortable. I ordered up because all the reviews said it runs small which isn't true, if you like it big order up but if you like fitting with a little extra order your size I ended up returning and getting my size because it was just a little to big. But I do love it and I would definitely recommend getting one to all my friends

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 18, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Dirty, Hairy and disgusting
reviews.reviewText: I bought this coat for my mother who lives in Montana. I traveled 10 hours to give it to her for a early Christmas present. It came wrapped in plastic but much to my horror when I took it out of the plastic to literally put it on my mom to wear it was dirty/dusty on the outside and had MANY pieces of hair on the inside liner. Gross. I told my mom I would return it and she said that’s okay she didn’t want to wait for another jacket to come in the mail. Bless her heart. I paid for a brand new jacket and got a used dirty one that looked like someone had picked it off the ground. So disappointed.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 4, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars This Jacket is Worth every penny
reviews.reviewText: The fit runs slightly small but with in parameters. I like mine a little loose this fits normal. The quality is worth every penny...and it is WARM!!! And is heavy. Would of loved to have this when I lived in Colorado.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 20, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I must say this coat is very warm.. What I don't like is that the hood is enormous and arm holes run very small. I bought a 3xl wanting to wear layers underneath.. Not happening! Color army green is spot on
This is a fantastic coat!. True to size. Perfect for a Canadian winter.
This is a very warm and comfortable jacket. Runs a bit large which is fine if you're wearing bulky sweaters. Recommended

This coat is nice and thick, heavy and warm. Great for this weather. I bought based on the charts height and weight and even went up a size and it fits snug. So definitely go up a size (or two if you’re like me and like baggy)
This coat was very nice but too heavy

Ordered a size larger than I normally wear and it was way too big. Ordered a size smaller and still a little big but works for a heavier sweater underneath. Zippers and buttons lok like good quality. Return of first purchase very easy.
